parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of solid bodies to affect

title: IThickenFeatureData.IGetFeatureScopeBodies
description: Gets the solid bodies that the thicken feature affects in a multibody part.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of solid bodies to affect

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of solid bodies that the thicken feature affects in a multibody part of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
COM users must call
IThickenFeatureData::GetFeatureScopeBodiesCount
before calling this method.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
